slashCommands.name: share
slashCommands.description: Export the current chat session to markdown

customCommands.name: test
customCommands.prompt: Write a comprehensive unit test for the selected code using the appropriate testing framework.

customCommands.name: explain
customCommands.prompt: Explain the selected code in detail. What does it do? How does it work?

customCommands.name: refactor
customCommands.prompt: Refactor the selected code to improve readability and maintainability while preserving functionality.
